titleStmt.title: Despatch from Judson A. Lewis to John Hay, May 17, 1880

bibl.title: Despatch from Judson A. Lewis to John Hay
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p:
No# 34 Smith St Brooklyn N.Y.
May 17th 1880.
J. A. Lewis To Dept State

Departure from Sierra Leone and arrival in New York.
Receipt of Copy of Leave of Absence.

No# 34 Smith St
Brooklyn N.Y.
May 17, 1880

Hon John Hay
Asst Secty of State
Washington D.C.
I have to inform you that I left Sierra Leone March 31st and arrived in New York May 6th 1880.

Your Dispatch of May 14th enclosing one copy of Leave of Absence & instructions has been duly received said instructions were duly compiled with & Mr Foley Vice Consul is now in charge of the Consulate at Sierra Leone.

With renewed respect I am very Truly
Judson A. Lewis
US Consul
Sierra Leone
